alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 12:25PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT GENEVA...CENTRAL HOUSTON... NORTHWESTERN JACKSON...NORTH CENTRAL WALTON AND HOLMES COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM CST... At 1224 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Geneva to 15 miles northwest of Bonifay to near De Funiak Springs. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graceville, Dothan, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Hartford, Taylor, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Kinsey, Union, Malvern, Rehobeth, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Madrid, Westville, and Campbellton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
